CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Activity__c) , "Prospect Reference Call", "$25 value reward", "Customer Quote Card", "$25 value reward", "Peer-to-Peer Review","$25 value reward", "New Product Testing", "$25 value reward", "Video Interview","$100 value reward", "Conference Panel","$100 value reward", "Webinar","$100 value reward", "Case Study","$200 value reward", "FQ/Company Press Release","$200 value reward", "Customer Referral","$500 check", NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a suggested reward based on their activity.
CustomField.label: Suggested Reward
